description: List the answers of a review template.

parameters.name: TemplateArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the review template.

parameters.name: LensAlias
parameters.description: The alias of the lens. For Amazon Web Services official lenses, this is either the lens alias, such as serverless, or the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-east-1::lens/serverless. Note that some operations (such as ExportLens and CreateLensShare) are not permitted on Amazon Web Services official lenses. For custom lenses, this is the lens ARN, such as arn:aws:wellarchitected:us-west-2:123456789012:lens/0123456789abcdef01234567890abcdef. Each lens is identified by its  LensSummary$LensAlias.

parameters.name: PillarId
parameters.description: The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security. A pillar is identified by its  PillarReviewSummary$PillarId.

nested_items.name: TemplateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the review template.

nested_items.name: LensAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of the lens.

nested_items.name: AnswerSummaries
nested_items.description: List of answer summaries of a lens review in a review template.

nested_items.name: QuestionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the question.

nested_items.name: PillarId
nested_items.description: The ID used to identify a pillar, for example, security.

nested_items.name: QuestionTitle
nested_items.description: The title of the question.

nested_items.name: Choices
nested_items.description: List of choices available for a question.

nested_items.name: ChoiceId
nested_items.description: The ID of a choice.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of a choice.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of a choice.

nested_items.name: HelpfulResource
nested_items.description: The helpful resource (both text and URL) for a particular choice.

nested_items.name: DisplayText
nested_items.description: The display text for the choice content.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL for the choice content.

nested_items.name: ImprovementPlan
nested_items.description: The improvement plan (both text and URL) for a particular choice.

nested_items.name: DisplayText
nested_items.description: The display text for the choice content.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL for the choice content.

nested_items.name: AdditionalResources
nested_items.description: The additional resources for a choice in a custom lens.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Type of additional resource for a custom lens.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The URLs for additional resources, either helpful resources or improvement plans, for a custom lens. Up to five additional URLs can be specified.

nested_items.name: DisplayText
nested_items.description: The display text for the choice content.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL for the choice content.

nested_items.name: SelectedChoices
nested_items.description: List of selected choice IDs in a question answer.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ChoiceAnswerSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of selected choices to a question in the review template.

nested_items.name: ChoiceId
nested_items.description: The ID of a choice.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a choice.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason why a choice is non-applicable to a question in your workload.

nested_items.name: IsApplicable
nested_items.description: Defines whether this question is applicable to a lens review.

nested_items.name: AnswerStatus
nested_items.description: The status of whether or not this question has been answered.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason why a choice is not-applicable to a question in the review template.

nested_items.name: QuestionType
nested_items.description: The type of question.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next set of results.
